title: A Mammoth 68-11 Gear, a Record Average Speed: Josh Tarling Delivers on Vast Potential at UAE Tour
content:
Tarling delivers on vast potential at UAE Tour: ‘It’s going to be nice to wear a fancy jersey’ says young Welshman.

Read the full article at A Mammoth 68-11 Gear, a Record Average Speed: Josh Tarling Delivers on Vast Potential at UAE Tour on Velo.
author: sstokes
